nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this be oobTransportFactory? Otherwise there is no CallCredentialsApplyingTransport and no callCreds can be sent over oobChannel?
I checked the new test and if the test is passing then this change seems to be correct.

This is the part that I mentioned was subtle in the description. It needs to be the original factory because this is getting passed to a new ManagedChannelImpl. That new instance will wrap the factory. If we use oobTransportFactory here then the CallCredentials are applied twice. This was a pre-existing bug that I only noticed because of the test I added.
Thanks for the explanation. Great catch.
